item.title: The Humble `` Element And Core Web Vitals

item.description: Yesterday, we looked at how to get the first and last elements inside a parent. Today, we’re going to look at how to get the next and previous sibling elements. Once again, we’re going to use some sample markup for today’s article. <ul> <!-- The gray wizard --> <li>Gandalf</li> <li>Radagast</li> <li id="hermione">Hermione</li> <!-- The surprise hero --> <li>Neville</li> </ul> Let’s dig in! The Node.nextSibling and Node.previousSibling properties The Node.nextSibling and Node.

item.title: Now THAT’S What I Call Service Worker!
